loc_start.name: The Beginning
loc_start.description: You stand in a gray void. To form the world, you must take an action. Will you draw a sword? Check your revolver? Or look at the stars?

scribe_loc_the_gray_void.name: The Gray Void
scribe_loc_the_gray_void.description: a vast, featureless gray void, an endless, uniform expanse of soft, muted gray stretching into infinity

scribe_loc_the_unknown.name: The Unknown
scribe_loc_the_unknown.description: A shimmering, indeterminate expanse, a path pregnant with infinite possibilities.

scribe_loc_the_path_'forward'.name: the path 'forward'
scribe_loc_the_path_'forward'.description: A tendril of distinction, a whisper of a path in the endless sameness, solidifying to guide you.

story_state.narrative_direction: The suffocating silence presses in further, intensifying the player's crushing despair.

shadow_queue.name: The Unending Void
shadow_queue.description: An infinite expanse of absolute nothingness, devoid of light, sound, or sensation. There are no up or down, no forwards or back—only a profound, disorienting emptiness that stretches beyond all comprehension. It feels both vast and claustrophobic at once, shattering any semblance of prior comfort.

shadow_queue.name: Echo of Self
shadow_queue.description: Not an object, but a persistent internal resonance. A faint, nagging sensation that 'you' exist, despite the complete lack of physical form or sensory input. It's the barest flicker of consciousness, a desperate anchor in the boundless non-existence, highlighting the immediate mystery of your own being.

shadow_queue.name: The Primordial Query
shadow_queue.description: A pervasive, voiceless thought that isn't your own, yet resonates deeply within your nascent consciousness. It isn't spoken, but felt: 'Why? What are you? Where is here?' It's the first ripple in the stillness of absolute non-existence, a fundamental question demanding an answer that simply does not exist within the void.

shadow_queue.name: The Winding Path
shadow_queue.description: A narrow, overgrown trail disappears into a mist-shrouded distance. The air here hums with the promise of journey.

shadow_queue.name: The Gray Abyss
shadow_queue.description: An impossibly deep chasm, its depths obscured by a shifting, light-absorbing gray mist. A profound silence emanates from it.

shadow_queue.name: The Harbinger of Choices
shadow_queue.description: A spectral figure, neither male nor female, translucent and shimmering with the light of countless branching futures. It gestures towards two unseen paths.

shadow_queue.name: A Simple Satchel
shadow_queue.description: A sturdy, if plain, leather satchel. It feels light, yet surprisingly resilient, ready to carry whatever tools a new journey might demand.
